institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Skill Competition Management Rules/Article 16-2 (International Skill Competition Deliberation Committee Functions and Operation)
contents: Article 16-2 (Function and operation of the International Skills Olympics Deliberation Committee) ① The Deliberation Committee deliberates and decides on the following matters. 1. Matters pertaining to the selection, reappointment, and dismissal of international competition group leaders and international leadership committee members (however, matters pertaining to dismissal due to expiration of the appointment period and disciplinary action are excluded) 2. Matters pertaining to the selection of judges and judges for the evaluation match for the selection of national team players; 3. Matters pertaining to the selection of national representatives in accordance with Article 103, Paragraph 4, 4. Matters pertaining to the selection of occupations participating in international competitions and the abolition of occupations, 5. Other matters separately determined by the Chairman, ② Deliberation Committee meetings shall be held with more than 2/3 of the registered members. In principle, decisions are made with the approval of a majority of the members present and present, and the chairperson has the right to vote and has the right to make a decision in case of a tie., ③ The Deliberation Committee must prepare and manage meeting minutes, including the meeting date and summary of remarks., ④ Deliberation Committee If the agenda is judged to be minor or unavoidable, it may be held in writing as an exception. [This article was newly established on January 8, 2021]
